message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $2,250,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate the value you see in this product, but I'm a bit constrained by my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth and the potential benefits it could bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, your offer is a significant way off from my valuation of the product. I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000. I believe this price reflects the true value and potential this product holds for your business.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,500,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.
